pages.title: Infusion of the Overworld
pages.description: The Infusion of the Overworld gives creatures the power to manipulate the earth and metals. The abilities available through the Infusion are utilized with various controls using a $(l:artifacts/tools/witches_hand)Witches Hand$(/l)

pages.title: Metal Disarm
pages.description: Interact with a creature holding a weapon made out of metal to disarm them.

pages.title: Earth Pillar
pages.description: Use on the ground to create a 3-blocks high pillar of $(item)Dirt$() with a $(item)Grass$() block on top.

pages.title: Launch Block
pages.description: Use on an unobstructed block to launch it in the direction the player faces, dealing damage to any entities it hits.

pages.title: Attract Metal
pages.description: Sneak-use to bring any nearby dropped metal items towards the user.

pages.title: Shockwave
pages.description: Hold down and release the right mouse button to create a circular shockwave that pushes and damages all surrounding entities. The longer the key is held down, the farther the shockwave will travel.

pages.title: Ore Smelting
pages.description: Use on an ore block to turn it to $(item)Stone$() and drop two $(item)Ingots$() of that metal.

pages.title: Metal Punch
pages.description: Punch a nearby entity in metal armor to push them a great distance.
